price: Hari n’ikindi cemezo cereka ababangikanyamana ko Imana Allah Ikwiye gusengwa ari Imwe Rudende Itabangikanywa, ni uko Twebwe Allah, Twarokoye mw’isegenya bamwe mu ruvyaro bakomokako rwa Adamu, maze Tubarerura mu bwato bwa Nuhu bwari burimwo amoko atandukanye y’ibiremwa vyose vy’igitsina-gabo n’igitsina-gore, ivyo bikaba ari na vyo vyahavuye biba intango y’ukurondoka bushasha;
arabic: وَءَايَةٞ لَّهُمۡ أَنَّا حَمَلۡنَا ذُرِّيَّتَهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡفُلۡكِ ٱلۡمَشۡحُونِ

meta.transliteration: waāyatun lahum annā ḥamalnā dhurriyyatahum fī al-ful'ki al-mashḥūni
